name: NorthStar Studios
tag_list: nashville, tennessee, broadcast, production, hd, high-def, studios, venue, stage, venuestage, satellite, fiber, streaming, network, origination, transmission, preproduction, postproduction, pre, post, field, final, cut, suites, live-hit, rfd, graphic-desi
overview: NorthStar Studios in Nashville, Tennessee is one of the largest broadcast-quality production facilities in the southeastern United States. The company boasts four large studios, two professional control rooms with Pro Tools audio suites, pre- and post-production services, as well as complete network origination and transmission services. In 2013, NorthStar launched its new VenueStage event broadcast platform that integrates its production features with social media and ticketing / merch backends for artists, organizations, and businesses.
